Agent.description: Information about the user who completed the application on behalf of someone else

Applicant.description: The user who completed the application either for themself or on behalf of someone else

ApplicationFee.description: The costs associated with this application

description.const: Prior Approval - Larger extension to a house
Prior Approval - Adding storeys to a house
Prior Approval - Convert a commercial building to mixed use
Prior Approval - Convert a mixed use building into a home
Prior Approval - Convert a commercial building into a home or homes
Prior Approval - Convert a casino or amusement arcade into a home or homes
Prior Approval - Convert an agricultural building into a home
Prior Approval - Convert an agricultural building to a commercial use
Prior Approval - Convert an agricultural building to a school
Prior Approval - Convert a commercial building to a school
Prior Approval - Put up a temporary structure
Prior Approval - Use a building or land to shoot a film
Prior Approval - Build new agricultural buildings on a unit of 5 hectares or more
Prior Approval - Build new agricultural buildings on a unit of less than 5 hectares
Prior Approval - Build new forestry buildings
Prior Approval - Install click and collect facilities
Prior Approval - Extend a school, college, university, prison or hospital
Prior Approval - Install or change solar panels
Prior Approval - Build homes on a detached blocks of flats
Prior Approval - Build homes on a detached commercial building
Prior Approval - Build homes on an adjoining commercial or mixed use building
Prior Approval - Build homes on adjoining houses
Prior Approval - Build homes on detached houses
Prior Approval - Demolish buildings and build homes in their place

ApplicationType.description: Planning application types supported by this schema

BaseApplicant.description: Information about the user who completed the application for themself, or information about the resident who the user applied on behalf of

File.description: Files uploaded by the user to support this application

FileType.description: Types of planning documents and drawings

service.description: Details of the digital planning service which generated this payload

OSAddress.description: Address information for sites with a known address sourced from Ordnance Survey AddressBase Premium

PreApplication.description: Details of the pre-application, if applicable

description.const: Add or remove a bay window
Changes to a fence, wall or gate
Install a satellite dish or aerial
Install a flue with a biomass burner
Install an outdoor tank (for example a water tank)
Change the material or colour of the external walls
Changes to a public road, pavement or path (including drop kerb)
Change the size of doorways or windows
Remove part of a building (such as a decorative feature)
Replace or change the roof materials
Change the shape of a roof
Add skylights to an existing roof
Add secondary glazing to a window
Add or replace a soil pipe
Add or change an external staircase
Add a decked area or patio
Add a driveway or parking area
Convert a building to a different use
Convert part of the property into a  granny flat (residential annexe)
Use a caravan or mobile home on the property
Let a part of the property
Convert an outbuilding (such as a shed, garage or barn)
Change the use of a property
Convert a home to bedsits or a shared home
Demolish a fence, gate or boundary wall
Demolish an outbuilding (such as a garage or barn)
Demolish part of a building (such as an extension)
Demolish a building and build homes in its place
Add an outbuilding (such as a shed, garage or garden office)
Add a rear or side extension (or conservatory)
Build new homes on a roof
Erect a temporary structure for historic visitor attractions and listed buildings
Convert two or more properties into one
Convert part of a house into a flat

Property.description: The site where the works will happen

PropertyType.description: Property types derived from Basic Land and Property Unit (BLPU) classification codes

ProposedAddress.description: Address information for sites without a known Unique Property Reference Number (UPRN)

Responses.description: The ordered list of questions, answers, and their metadata for this application

Result.description: The result of this application. Results are determined by flags corresponding to responses; each application can have up to one result per flagset

description.const: It looks like the changes may now be beyond the time limit for enforcement action. This does not apply if the changes have been deliberately concealed.
There is some key information missing that will be needed to assess this application.
It looks like the proposed changes may require planning permission.
It looks like the proposed changes do not require planning permission, however the applicant must apply for Prior Approval before proceeding.
It looks like the proposed changes may not require planning permission, however the applicant must provide notice to the planning authority before proceeding.
It looks like the proposed changes may fall within the rules for Permitted Development and therefore would not need planning permission.
It looks like the proposed changes may not fall within the legal definition of 'development', and therefore would not require planning permission.

Works to trees & hedges / De minimis
Works to trees & hedges / Not required
Demolition in a conservation area / Missing information
Demolition in a conservation area / Required

Demolition in a conservation area / Not required
Planning policy / Fails to meet policy

ResultFlag.description: An individual result of this application

SiteContact.description: Contact information for the site visit

SiteContactOther.description: Contact information for the site visit when the SiteContact's role is 'other'

User.description: The role of the user who completed the application

UserAddressNotSameSite.description: Address information for any user who's contact information differs from the site address
